thread.section_title: TransferWise Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TransferWise | transferwise.com | 14 of 1794
thread.title: Shehri

author: Shehri
title: Shehri
text: I sent 2 overseas payments dated 2/5/2017. Expected time was to receive payment by 13 of Feb 2017. Payments have been already received ahead of time. Dated 2/7/2017. Payments were only delayed, just because of my Bank to clear the payments. I would love to use TrasferWise. I have lost a lot of money using Western Union. Highly Recommended. The transaction was from US$ to PKR. Only charged 3$/transaction less than 500$. Thanks.
